definition: abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
London International Financial Futures and Options Exchange (LIFFE)
pinyin: Lun2 dun1 Guo2 ji4 Jin1 rong2 Qi1 huo4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3
containing_words.word: 倫敦國際金融期貨交易所

sentences.english: But US stock markets tumbled along with oil and gold.
sentences.chinese: 而美國股市及石油和黃金期貨價格卻集體暴跌。

sentences.english: First, you need a proven trading process that works for futures trading.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你需要證明你的期貨交易過程的可行的。

sentences.english: The price fixed by the clearing house at which deliveries on futures are invoiced.
sentences.chinese: 由結算所確定的期貨商品交割的票面價格。

sentences.english: Guidelines for futures commission merchants engaging in market making business shall be separately promulgated by this Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 期貨商從事造市業務之作業辦法，由本公司另訂之。

sentences.english: The dissertation dealing with accounting of Interest Rate Futures (IRFs) is comprised of three sections.
sentences.chinese: 本文對於利率期貨會計問題分三個部分進行了探討。

sentences.english: Huixin Futures cooperate with other professional institutions over financial futures services.
sentences.chinese: 匯鑫期貨與有關專業機構就金融期貨業務開展合作。

sentences.english: Huixin Futures cooperate with other professional institutions over financial futures services.
sentences.chinese: 匯鑫期貨與有關專業機構就金融期貨業務開展合作。

sentences.english: Equity swap between shareholders of the listed company and shareholders of Huixin Futures.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司股東與匯鑫期貨股東進行股權置換。

sentences.english: Up period beginning today rebar and wire rod futures simulated trading.
sentences.chinese: 上期所於今日開始螺紋鋼和線材期貨模擬交易。

sentences.english: While Zhou Nan, his previous life, comes to the present age, and the ancient Taoist priest becomes a futures trader.
sentences.chinese: 他的前世周南來到現代，古代的道士做了期貨交易員。

sentences.english: For example, there's relation between interest rate and Eurodollar futures.
sentences.chinese: 例如，有利率與歐洲美元期貨的關係。

sentences.english: The commission-revenue maximization exchange innovates futures contract.
sentences.chinese: 代辦收入最大化交換促成期貨合約的創新。

sentences.english: The futures company concerned shall check and verify the real identity of the agent by crosscheck .
sentences.chinese: 期貨公司應當對照覈實代理人的真實身份。

sentences.english: Asian shares were mixed while U. S. stock futures were pointing to mild gains on Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲股市漲跌互現，美國股指期貨開盤後小幅走高。

sentences.english: Conceptualisation of KLOFFE as an "Options and Futures Exchange".
sentences.chinese: 吉隆坡期貨和期權交易所的概念化？

sentences.english: On both Wednesday and Thursday, the price of oil briefly hit $100 a barrel.
sentences.chinese: 國際原油期貨價格一度突破每桶100美元大關。

definition: to settle a bill/to close an account
merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
